activities:
We are a multinational provider of information technology outsourcing services. We anticipate the transfer of certain information about our European and Swiss employees to the US. 
We also provide technical support for the clients and end users on IT and business process infrastructure, network environments and computing systems, and from shrink wrapped applications to proprietary and acquired application systems, as well as, consumer products.  Customer Information:   Stefanini participates in the U.S.-EU and U.S.-Swiss Safe Harbor privacy principles with respect to personal data as representatives of certain customers from the European Union (EU)and Switzerland in connection with its hosting services. As a hosting provider, Stefanini may manage data on behalf of its customers that could transfer their data from the EU or Switzerland to the United States. Stefanini does not own this specific data and is not a "data controller" as outlined in the EU data protection directive.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line, Manually Processed Data,  Human Resources Data
recoursemech: EU and Swiss Data Protection Authorities
